participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, Alex enjoys spending time in fantasy worlds through games and movies. She's sensitive and prefers staying away from anything that could cause her distress.
participant_1.background: my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it. i dye my hair every three months. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Emma loves to explore new stories and characters. She's very enthusiastic about her interests, especially when it comes to Disney and singing.
participant_2.background: i love to go to disney world every year. i am in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen.

content.text: I love to watch Hollywood moy
